statements: DELETE FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker_name = 'John Doe' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker_name = 'Alice' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE transcript_id IN (SELECT id FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker = 'Alice');
DELETE FROM transcript_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01' AND analysis_result = 'positive';
DELETE FROM speakers WHERE speaker_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM speakers WHERE speaker_name = 'John Doe';
